Question.Subject: xbox 360 an internet?
Question.Content: have wireless a low signal into my apartment i wonder if there is an antenna to boost the signal because i would like to play online with my xbox 360 i also have a laptop but isnot wifi but i can get a cheap wifi laptop if i need it to get my xbox 360 online thanks God bless you
Question.ChosenAnswer: You would have to buy a router and set up the router as a bridge to "boost" with antennas. Or try moving it closer to your neighbour with the internet

Answer.Content: You would have to buy a router and set up the router as a bridge to "boost" with antennas. Or try moving it closer to your neighbour with the internet
